title: Trump and DeSantis Plan Dueling Florida Rallies as Rivalry Builds
description: Former President Donald J. Trump and Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida, who is viewed as his most likely political challenger, planned competing campaign events.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender and Maggie Haberman
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: Different times in 2020: President Donald J. Trump and Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida appeared together at a pandemic event then in Belleair, Fla.
